subject: Re: Not ordinary some old stuff voices.
author: purplespacefriend
full_text:
I suppose, just don't think it's necessary to post every voice one 
receives. That takes up alot of storage space after a while. 

 F-S



--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "LC Duplatt" <lcdupla@...> wrote:
>
> Interesting post, FS.  
> 
> I just like to think that everyone has their time and purpose.  
You 
> receive what you are to receive for a purpose.  Others receive 
what 
> they are to receive, for a purpose. 
> 
> It will all wash out in the end, Purple Princess of the Seven.  :)
> 
> LC
> 
> --- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, Frank Sumption <purplealiengirl@> 
> wrote:
> >
> > 
> > From; http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Count_of_St_Germain 'Saint 
> Germain is always associated with the color violet, the jewel 
> amethyst, and the Maltese cross rendered in violet (usually the 
iron 
> cross style cross patee version); he is also regarded as 
the 'Chohan 
> of the Seventh Ray'[13]  according to Theosophy, the Seven Rays 
are 
> seven metaphysical principles that govern both individual souls 
and 
> the unfolding of each 2,158 year long Astrological Age. Since 
> according to Theosophy the next Astrological Age, the Age of 
> Aquarius, will be governed by the Seventh (Violet) Ray (the Ray of 
> Ceremonial Order), Saint Germain is sometimes called 'The Hierarch 
of 
> the Age of Aquarius'. According to the Ascended Master Teachings, 
> Saint Germain is 'The God of Freedom for the Earth'.'
> >  
> >  Much to do with the Purple Princess, and the seven. I don't 
mean 
> to sell others short, I just get a different level, and find 
> regular "this your auntie" type EVPs kinda useless. Mostly I don't 
> post every voice I get, just the ones that I thought was 
outstanding, 
> but no one else hears.
> >  
> > Frank-S

> >
